item.title: PowerShell for Security: Continuous post of AD Weaknesses
item.description: Headings ## Heading 2 ### Heading 3 #### Heading 4 ##### Heading 5 ###### Heading 6 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Idea behind this post ## 1. Clear-Text Passwords In Sysvol (KB2962486) ### Problem: ### Solution: ### Script: As an Active Directory professional, I have gained insights into its unsecure features and outdated legacy “ideas,” as well as the growing list of vulnerabilities in the ADDS, ADCS & ADFS suite.
